column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////The place seems really cool... really nice atmosphere. I think this would be a fun place to come for drinks with friends. As for the food
column2: the appetizers all had meat in them except one (pimento dip)... being a pescatarian
column3: that was all I could order. My friend who can't eat pork (but does eat other meat) was limited in options
column4: too. Glad they had the pimento dip.
